string-array.name: financial_advice
string-array.item: Track your spending to see where your money goes.
Create a budget and stick to it.
Set financial goals to motivate yourself.
Save for emergencies to avoid debt.
Pay off high-interest debt as quickly as possible.
Invest in your future by saving for retirement.
Look for ways to increase your income.
Don\'t be afraid to ask for help from a financial advisor.
